programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1805
programme.desc: Best of Madison Square Garden - New York Citys Madison Square Garden has hosted some of the best fights in UFC history. On this episode of UFC Unleashed, weve got a collection of bouts coming from the Mecca of combat sports. Featuring Zhang Weili, Georges St-Pierre, and more.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep702
programme.desc: Fighter Focus: Benoit St Denis, Locked In: Kevin Holland, Take 5: Molly McCann - Born into a military family, Benoit Saint-Denis joined the French special forces keen to fight for his country; after an exceptional military career he continues to represent France but on a different battlefield; the Octagon. Kevin Holland explains how trash talk and verbal warfare can be used as a weapon inside and outside the Octagon. UFC strawweight Molly McCann lists her top 5 spinning KOs of all time.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES - Ridiculous reflexes from Vicario, Onana & Maignan. 10 of the best saves from the 22/23 Serie A season.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: UFC returns to Manchester, England with a stacked card. In the main event, Birminghams Leon Edwards defends his welterweight title for the third time against old rival Belal Muhammad, who brings a10-fight unbeaten streak into this long awaited rematch. In the co-main, Manchester's own Tom Aspinall seeks to retain his interim heavyweight belt vs heavy hitter Curtis Blaydes. All this and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep7
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep24
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.desc: UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Machado Garry vs. Prates
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFCs return to Kansas City on April 27 features a five-round main event clash between two of the welterweight divisions top fighters, as Irish star Ian Machado Garry squares off against Brazilian finisher Carlos Prates at UFC Fight Night in T-Mobile Center. Making his first start since a memorable five-round war with Shavkat Rakhmonov, Machado Garry hopes to punch his ticket to a place in the title conversation, but the surging Prates has been unstoppable since arriving in the UFC with four knockout wins, and he intends on making his own case for a crack at the crown

programme.title: UFC 314: Volkanovski vs. Lopes
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the greatest featherweights of all-time gets the chance to regain his crown on April 12 when Alexander Volkanovski faces streaking Brazilian contender Diego Lopes for the vacant UFC featherweight championship in the main event of UFC 314 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida. Plus, its one of the most highly anticipated bouts of 2025 when British star Paddy Pimblett meets up with Iron Michael Chandler in a five-round co- main event showdown, and international sensation Patricio Pitbull battles former interim featherweight king Yair Rodriguez.
